## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a43a0e5d5c9f583954d954b1a27badf0220728b50a05983479b1e2e212e8c16e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sys-scikit-learn' @ 17.8.18 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
